<script>
function filterFaculty() {
  var searchName = document.getElementById('search-name').value.toLowerCase();
  var filterArea = document.getElementById('filter-area').value;
  var cards = document.querySelectorAll('.faculty-card');

  cards.forEach(function(card) {
    var name = card.getAttribute('data-name').toLowerCase();
    var area = card.getAttribute('data-area');
    var matchName = name.includes(searchName);
    var matchArea = (filterArea === '') || (area === filterArea);

    if (matchName && matchArea) {
      card.style.display = '';
    } else {
      card.style.display = 'none';
    }
  });
}
</script>
